name: With Me Forever
description:
The world is long gone and everything fell apart, while searching for food you find a little robot in a ruin and decide to help her find her lost "father".

This game was made for the O2A2 2022, which means the game must be done with only:

- 1 Background

- 1 Sprite

- 1 SFX

- 1 BGM

- 1000 Words

Here some extra rules I added to this entry:

- 1 choice

- 1 jam reference (Story relevant!)

Plus 1 challenge for myself:

- Make the game ENTIRELY on a smartphone (From planning to release).

Please leave a comment for any grammar errors or typos.

Credits:

Developer:

- Story & Code: Sunetraalex

Assets:

- Background: Gwendal Cottin

- Sprite: Gordon Ferrell

- Factory Ambiance: yd

- 68 Workshop Sounds: bart
